sentences.sentence: Slava, Ukraine. Rescue teams searching for a missing submersible, which was taking five people down to the wreck of the Titanic, say they've detected underwater noises.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: U.S. Coast Guard officials have relocated the search efforts after hearing the sounds described as banging.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Search teams are racing against the clock to locate the sub, which vanished in the North Atlantic on Sunday, as air supplies are used up.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: On behalf of all the men and women of the United States Coast Guard and our search partners, we offer our most heartfelt thoughts and prayers for the five crew members, their families, and their loved ones.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: The search for the vessel, named Titan, is very complex and is covering a wide and deep expanse of ocean, and it's unclear what's caused both of its communication systems to stop functioning.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: The destruction of the Kakovka hydroelectric dam has caused an estimated 1.2 billion euros of damage.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: The amount is vast, but for locals living in flooded settlements in the Kherson region, that damage is all too evident in their daily struggles.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The waters have receded, but help is still needed, and a clean-up seems a long way off.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Volunteers from all over the country are helping people from the flooded settlements. They carry humanitarian aid, including clothes, food, soap, washing powders and other cleaning and hygiene items.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Evacuations are continuing for those who just can't see a normal life resuming any time soon.

sentences.sentence: For Ukraine's farmers, there is an added dangerous consequence of the dam burst.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Landmines laid by occupying Russian troops have been moved around by the floodwaters.

sentences.sentence: Farmers had, until now, managed to clear swathes of agricultural land.

sentences.sentence: The other problem facing farmers is how to irrigate their crops.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Without the Kukovka dam, the irrigation machines and the supply canals are left dry.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08

sentences.sentence: Finland's new government, led by Conservative Prime Minister Pateri Orpo, has been formally sworn in.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Orpo won elections in April and has been in thorny negotiations to build a coalition since then.

sentences.sentence: The European Commission says it's time to protect the EU's critical infrastructure and industries at the same time as reducing its dependency on what it calls foreign actors.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Without directly naming China, the European Economic Security Strategy, as it's known, details plans for Brussels to intervene more in how EU companies invest and trade in critical sectors.

sentences.sentence: In economic security, we're looking at a limited small set of cutting-edge technologies and here we want to make sure that they do not enhance the military capacities of some countries of concern that is basically the philosophy behind it the European Commission proposes strengthening its control in three areas inbound investment screening for critical companies outbound investment screening for critical companies, outbound investment screening for advanced technologies and export controls for critical technologies.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02

The plans will be discussed by European leaders at next week's summit in Brussels. Celebrating a unique once-a-year experience, a disparate gathering of revelers came together at Stonehenge in southern England to mark the summer solstice, the longest day in the Northern Hemisphere.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Druids, hippies and the simply curious sang, danced and chanted as the sun rose over the ancient stones looming over Salisbury Plain.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
